projects

project-01: AI C4?

Connect 4: Player chooses PvP or AI opponent, inputs selected columns,
and gets to choose how many moves ahead the AI thinks (python)

click me for details!







project-02: Seam Carving

Algorithm selects a seam in uploaded picture with minimum energy to delete,
carving out pixels to allow for dynamic resizing of photos (java)


click me for details!







project-03: Personal GradeBook

Grade book program that utilizes JAXB marshalling and unmarshalling
to save files in XML, allowing for easy grade calculation (java)

click me for details!







project-04: Netflix+

Chrome extension that adds ratings and expiration dates to Netflix titles,
winner of 5C Hackathon in the Intermediate category! (javascript)

click me for details!







project-05: Snake on Steroids!

An implementation of the classic snake game that toggles between AI/user control,
and can spawn an additional evil Snake to compete for points against! (java).

click me for details!







project-06: Machine Learning

Trained a neural net to recognize and categorize hand drawn numbers
to a 95% success rate. Dataset and assignment designed by Andrew Ng. (octave).

(more details coming soon!)







project-07: Speaking Shakespeare

Markov-chain algorithm randomly generates poetry in the style of Shakespeare's sonnets.
Alternatively, generate Trump (or anyone's!) tweets by entering their twitter handle. (python).

click me for details!







project-08: This Website!

Coding this website was a great way to do a lil front-end developing!
Also, it was really, really fun. :~) (html, css, javascript)

so mEta!1!
